article: mitt romney tried to slow sen. john mccain 's momentum wednesday night as their final debate before the tuesday contests turned into a raucous and occasionally angry clash over their conservative credentials , the war in iraq , their government records and charges and countercharges of dirty campaigning .
abstract: romney and mccain tangle at debate but also try to mold a two-man race
